policy.xml:
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK CIBA Initiate User Authentication"/>
                        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: If the User authentication initiation fails, this policy should falsify itself."/>
                        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Context Variables:"/>
                        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                            <L7p:Comment stringValue="user_req_id : User Request Id"/>
                        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                            <L7p:Comment stringValue="user_info: User info"/>
                        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                            <L7p:Comment stringValue="binding_message: Binding message"/>
                        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                            <L7p:Comment stringValue="expiration: Expire time in seconds"/>
                        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                            <L7p:Comment stringValue="scope: Scope"/>
                        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                            <L7p:Comment stringValue="client_key: Client Key"/>
                        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                            <L7p:Comment stringValue="client_name: client_name"/>
                        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                    </wsp:All>
                </wsp:Policy>
